name: 21st Century Cupid
description:
How to Play: On the left side of the screen are couples. Use the dropdown menus to choose two people who make the best couple. Use the Dating Profiles on the right side of the screen for clues on which two people are the most compatible. You can only use each person once. Once you're done finding all the couples, press the FINISHED button to check your results!

A game made in under 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

When I thought of the idea of "Joined Together", I thought about couples. People come together in love. So, here's a puzzle game about being the best modern matchmaker!

I wanted to add music, sounds, and animations but times running out and I'm exhausted.

Enjoy and feedback is welcome, but I'm not sure if I'll even ever update this.
